lightning_lee.story: Kim is a former aerospace engineer who now builds quiz games for fun. When she isn’t hosting, she’s volunteering at the planetarium and teaching kids how to spot meteor showers.

pixel_pal.story: Jordan started out speedrunning retro games and now coaches contestants on staying calm under studio lights. Fun fact: they collect vintage arcade marquees and can beat any boss with one hand tied behind their back.

the_oracle.story: Samir reads a book a week and keeps flashcards for obscure capitals. He once predicted the final round question word-for-word on live TV, which is why everyone watches him when the music swells.
